主题
func:
msg.topic = global.get("mqtt").topic.business.pub.prefix + msg.payload.hd.gid

name: 空调1
func:
let pld = msg.payload.pld;
return {payload: pld};

name: 状态
func:
node.status({fill:"green", shape:"dot", text: JSON.stringify(msg.payload)});
return {payload:{pld: msg.payload}};
